duties_responsibilities.duty: Organize and schedule Working Group meetings to identify and prioritize exercise requirements
Lead writing team to document exercise requirements and prepare briefings and meeting minutes
Integrate joint exercise requirements with service exercise activities and ensure readiness support
Deliver Service Exercise Plan annually and as required, and staff/coordinate policies and procedures in support of USSF exercises
Attend exercise planning conferences and prepare leadership to participate in Service and Joint Exercise events
Support Exercise Coordination Team events, review and validate exercise training objectives and scenarios, as well as exercise planning and execution
Travel may be required for limited durations to support Customer events

education_certification.credential: Active TS/SCI clearance required; Headquarters experience in the US Space Force, US Air Force, Combatant Command, STARCOM, Space Operations Command, or equivalent
